name: PresidentKimballTalks
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: president kimball talks
des: Select talks from Spencer W. Kimball, 12th President of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. Talks include 'The Lord Expects Righteousness' - read by his personal secretary, D. Arthur Haycock, 'The Lord Is at the Helm', 'Remember the Mission of the Church' - read by D. Arthur Haycock, 'Follow the Fundamentals', 'We Are on the Lord’s Errand', 'Rendering Service to Others', 'Families Can Be Eternal', 'The Law of Tithing', 'Learn—Then Teach' and 'Give Me This Mountain'.
